CSSMathProduct.summary: The CSSMathProduct interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents the result obtained by calling , , or on . It inherits properties and methods from its parent .

CSSMathProductCSSMathProduct.summary:
NOTE Experimental The CSSMathProduct() constructor creates
a new object which creates a new
object which multiplies the arguments passed into it.

CSSMathProductValues.summary:
The CSSMathProduct.values read-only
property of the interface returns a
object which contains one or more
objects.
